text: Barksdale is an unincorporated community in Laurens County, in the U.S. state of South Carolina. ==History== A post office called Barksdale was established in 1892, and remained in operation until 1933. The community derives its name from a local family of settlers. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in South Carolina Category:Unincorporated communities in Laurens County, South Carolina
title: Barksdale, South Carolina
